name: The Ball Game Beta v0.1.1
description:
Play as a blue Ball in a world of geometry. Survive by dodging pointy objects and making it to the end of each level alive. Patience is key as is keeping calm and taking it slow. No checkpoints, no mercy. 

Can be played with a controller or keyboard.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

v0.1.1 Update

-Added First boss on stage 4, floor 1

-Moved stage 4 to floor 2

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Suitable for any windows computer, low-end or high-end.

Suitable for all ages.

Ideas for more features and different aspects are highly appreciated, this game is built by the diverse ideas of those who may play it. Help the game grow, it's FREE!
